forum.content:
Some day…
I had a date with a girl…

Bear：「Hi…I'm bear. Are you fat-fat ?」
When she turn around…＆saw my face…
She was very scared.
So, she told me…
She：「Oh, my god. you're a real bear !」
Bear：「Yes, I'm a real bear.」
She：「Oh, shit. I'm sorry. I don’t like a bear.」
Bear：「Oh,oh…」
She：「I thought you…just joked…」
She：「Who's know you're a real bear ?」
Bear：「………」
She：「So, I'm sorry. I can't be your friend.」
Bear：「Okay…」
She：「So, nice to see you. bye…」
Bear：「Okay…bye…」


（END…）
forum.title: 【friendship online…】
